items.name: Fresh Hand–Cut Fries
items.description: Sprinkled with our famous fry dust.

items.name: Homemade Hushpuppies
items.description: With shredded cheddar jack cheese & raspberry jalapeno dipping sauce. Ask about additional options.

items.name: Burger
items.description: Cooked medium-well & served on a toasted bun topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, mayo & mustard. Gluten-Free bun available on request.

items.name: Cheeseburger
items.description: Cooked medium-well & served on a toasted bun topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, mayo & mustard. Gluten-Free bun available on request.

items.name: Bacon Cheeseburger
items.description: Cooked medium-well & served on a toasted bun topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, mayo & mustard. Gluten-Free bun available on request.

items.name: Green Chili Cheeseburger
items.description: Cooked medium-well & served on a toasted bun topped with lettuce, tomato, onion, pickles, mayo & mustard. Gluten-Free bun available on request.

items.name: Patty Melt
items.description: Our burger with grilled onions, double cheddar cheese & tomato on butter grilled rye bread with our special blend 1000 island dressing. Sub grilled or blackened chicken + $2.00, Mahi or shrimp + $2.95.

items.name: Bacon Swiss Burger
items.description: Topped with melted Swiss cheese, applewood bacon served on a toasted bun with baby greens, tomato, grilled onion & garlic mayo.

items.name: Shrimp Burger
items.description: Lots of juicy minced shrimp with fresh veggies, herbs, spices & eggs. Only breading is toasted bun! Baby greens, tomato, onion & homemade tartar sauce.

items.name: Florentine Chicken Burger
items.description: We hand grind chicken breast, mixed with fresh spinach & chunks of creamy feta cheese grilled & served on your choice of bun or multi-grain bread with garlic mayo, baby greens & tomato.

items.name: Shrimp Sandwich
items.description: Your Way – Fried, Grilled or Blackened on a bun with lettuce, tomato, onion & homemade tartar sauce. Add Cheese + $2.00 or Green Chili + $2.95.

items.name: Shrimp or Mahi Reuben
items.description: Juicy grilled fish or shrimp on a butter rye bread topped with tangy sauerkraut, special blend dressing & melted Swiss cheese.

items.name: Mahi Sandwich
items.description: Your Way – Fried, Grilled or Blackened on a bun with lettuce, tomato & onion. Topped with tartar sauce. Add cheese + $2.00 or Green Chili + $2.95.

items.name: Chicken Sandwich
items.description: Your Way – Fried, Grilled or Blackened on a bun with lettuce, tomato & onion. Topped with mayo. Add cheese + $2.00 or Green Chili + $2.95.

items.name: Chicken Club
items.description: Classic style club with bacon, lettuce, tomato & mayo on a toasted multi-grain or try it as a wrap ($14.95).

items.name: Three Cheese Keys Steak
items.description: With fresh grilled garlic & onions topped with three different cheeses & served on a toasted ciabatta with baby greens, tomato & homemade garlic mayo.

items.name: Tuna Melt
items.description: Homemade yellowfin tuna salad on a toasted rye with fresh mix of ingredients with sliced tomato & melted cheese. Make it a salad instead with baby greens & pita points served in a tomato star ($21.95).

items.name: Tuna Steak Sandwich
items.description: Thick tuna filet grilled or blackened on a toasted bun with garlic mayo, lettuce, tomato & onion.

items.name: Shrimp Plate
items.description: Grilled, Blackened or Fried! Served with our homemade hushpuppies & slaw. Make it double + $15.00.

items.name: Mahi Plate
items.description: Grilled, Blackened or Fried! Served with our homemade hushpuppies & slaw.

items.name: Shrimp & Fish Combo Plate
items.description: Grilled, Blackened or Fried! Served with our homemade hushpuppies & slaw.

items.name: Chicken Plate
items.description: Grilled, Blackened or Fried! Served with our homemade hushpuppies & slaw.

items.name: Bacon Wrapped BBQ Shrimp
items.description: Succulent shrimp wrapped with applewood smoked bacon brushed with our natural hickory whiskey BBQ sauce & served with black beans & rice or hushpuppies & coleslaw.

items.name: Black Beans & Rice
items.description: Served with flour tortilla, shredded lettuce & fresh salsa. Add protein cooked grilled, blackened or fried: chicken ($17.95), Mahi, Tuna Steak or shrimp ($19.95).

items.name: Caesar Pita
items.description: Your choice of protein cooked Your Way! Grilled, Blackened or Fried nestled in a warm pita atop baby greens & sliced tomato splashed with our creamy Caesar dressing. Chicken ($16.95), Mahi, Tuna Steak or Shrimp ($18.95).

items.name: Tuna Poke
items.description: A heaping helping of cubed sushi grade yellow fin tuna marinated in slightly spicy poke sauce with minced green onion, red onion & red bell pepper served on pineapple rounds & sprinkled with toasted sesame seeds served with crispy wonton chips.

items.name: Garden Salad
items.description: Made with fresh baby greens & veggies. Add grilled, blackened chicken ($16.95) or mahi, tuna steak or shrimp ($19.95). Served with choice of dressing: ranch, bleu cheese, 1000 island, honey mustard, balsamic vinaigrette, Caesar or oil & vinegar.

items.name: Taco Salad
items.description: Your choice of fajita seasoned protein atop shredded lettuce, fresh salsa & crisp tortilla chips topped with shredded cheese, guacamole & sour cream served with black beans. Ground Beef or Chicken ($17.95), Mahi or Shrimp ($19.95).

items.name: Quesadilla
items.description: Your choice of protein, tomato & shredded cheese inside a butter grilled flour tortilla & served with guacamole & sour cream. Cheese ($11.95), Ground Beef or Chicken ($18.95), Mahi, Tuna Steak or Shrimp ($20.95).

items.name: Key Lime Pie
items.description: The best Key Lime Pie on the island!

items.name: Deep Fried Key Lime Pie
items.description: The best Key Lime Pie on the island, deep fried!
